properties.Name: Sound Off Yoga
properties.Description: South Street Seaport will be taken over by hundreds of yogis for a special Deep Flow Yoga Session under the stars!

properties.Name: Golden Bridge Yoga
properties.Description: Golden Bridge is a community, a village, where you can develop a meaningful yogic practice and a yogi lifestyle.

properties.Name: TITLE Boxing Club
properties.Description: This Hell's Kitchen boxing and kickboxing based studio burns up to 1,000 calories/hour and is focused on toning muscle and burning fat.

properties.Name: UFC Gym - Fidi
properties.Description: UFC GYM is the ultimate fitness destination for men, women and kids who want to train like champions.

properties.Name: Flywheel
properties.Description: Flywheel is equipped with technology that sets a new standard for indoor cycling.

properties.Name: Peloton
properties.Description: A high-end brick and mortar cycling studio, featuring the best indoor cycling instructors.

properties.Name: Drill Fitness
properties.Description: Drill Fitness classes are the epitome of exercise efficiency. Just 50 minutes of Drill Ride or Drill Body will annihilate 1,000 calories.

properties.Name: TheRun
properties.Description: The Shaper class is composed of 30 minutes of running intervals and 15 minutes of form drills, stretches and exercises on the treadmill.

properties.Name: Sacred Sounds Yoga
properties.Description: This studio is a Mecca of tranquility set in the hustle and bustle of Greenwich Village.

properties.Name: Reflections Yoga
properties.Description: Reflections offers classes and workshops in yoga, Franklin Method, Yin Yoga, and much more!

properties.Name: Church Street Boxing Gym
properties.Description: Shed the weight, tone up, and learn to FIGHT BACK at New York's Premium, Highly Staffed Boxing Gym!

properties.Name: Krav Maga Academy
properties.Description: Krav Maga Academy offers the highest level of Krav Maga in NYC.

properties.Name: Flywheel Sports
properties.Description: Best spin class in NYC at Chelsea's newest spin studio Flywheel!

properties.Name: Deep Water Running
properties.Description: Robert J Valentin's Deep Water Running is a non-impact form of running in place done in a pool while wearing a flotation belt.

properties.Name: Tone House
properties.Description: Tone House believes that movement training is the key to effective athletic-based, sports conditioning workouts.

properties.Name: Circuit of Change
properties.Description: The Mindbody Bootcamp combines key elements of martial arts, cardio core strengthening, gymnastics.
